name: etymologist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who studies the origin and history of words: He was known as an etymologist as well as for his poetry. The task of our etymologist is to determine the earliest recorded occurrence of a word. See
etymology
More examplesFewer examplesHe was the chief etymologist for the dictionary.The organization includes linguists, lexicographers, etymologists, grammarians, and others.An etymologist can answer questions of word origin and also of why a word has certain spellings and usages.
